**Hellfire Mortar** is a level 7 [Fire](/Fire_Magic "Fire Magic")/[Earth](/Earth "Earth") spell that creates a line of temporary [lava](/Lava "Lava") in a chosen direction (even through walls) and spawns a [hellfire mortar](/Hellfire_mortar_\(monster\) "Hellfire mortar (monster)") that moves along that line of lava, firing autonomously at nearby targets while it does so. The mortar's [HD](/HD "HD") is `3 + pow / 28`.

The mortar fires [Bolts of Magma](/Bolt_of_Magma "Bolt of Magma") at up to 2 different random enemy targets each turn, then moves 1 tile further along the path that was carved out for it. When it reaches the end of this path (or a monster blocks its attempt to move), it will disappear.

 Hellfire Mortar
Level 7
School1 Earth
School2 Fire
Source(s) Book of Armaments
Compendium of Siegecraft
Casting noise 7
Spell noise 20
Power Cap 200
Range 8
Splits apart the ground in front of the caster and sculpts a terrifying weapon out of molten rock. This mortar will move slowly along the lava-filled chasm, autonomously launching gouts of magma at the caster's enemies as it does so.

When it reaches the end of its path, or is obstructed in its movement by another creature, it will sink back into the lava, and the chasm will seal itself shut shortly thereafter.

Hellfire Mortar is a level 7 Fire/Earth spell that creates a line of temporary lava in a chosen direction (even through walls) and spawns a hellfire mortar that moves along that line of lava, firing autonomously at nearby targets while it does so. The mortar's HD is 3 + pow / 28.

The mortar fires Bolts of Magma at up to 2 different random enemy targets each turn, then moves 1 tile further along the path that was carved out for it. When it reaches the end of this path (or a monster blocks its attempt to move), it will disappear.
